### Resizing images

```{r}
# use openCV resize image.
library(opencv)

img <- magick::image_read("ship_images/1_HUA-GAO-IMO-8418629-MMSI-413376030.jpg")

img <- ocv_read("ship_images/1_NOVEMBER-IMO-0-MMSI-244730157.jpg")

img_res <- opencv::ocv_resize(img, width = 320, height = 320)

```
